Eric can introduce you to 4 people at American Express
Having a great time in Hawaii while the 70+ person Pac Biz staff in the Philippines wraps up another week of work for our US and Canadian clients.

We help businesses grow to hire more high paying jobs in the US.  Lets schedule a call to talk about how Pac Biz can help follow up on leads, call prospects or provide 24/7 customer service for your business!

We offer call center services to any English speaking country. We provide scalable solutions that use live, college educated and trained staff, dedicated to you to help your business grow.We specialize in businesses that need help with inbound calls. The work is done out of our office in Dumaguete, Philippines and our clients are based in the United States and Canada. We offer around the clock dedicated staff, on site management, bi-weekly reporting, easy billing options and more. 95% of our staff has a college degree and the average agent has between 3-5 years call center experience working with United States based clients. Visit PacBizSrv.com for more information or send me a message if you would like to setup a meeting to learn more.
Monsoon Marketing and Video Productions LLC

● Co-Own with wife Abby and with staff of 5● Specialize in web, video and digital marketing ● Focus on businesses earning 1MM year + in the pharmacy, high ticket services and transportation companies● Provide solutions for businesses that need: Monthly blogs, social media content, email and sms sent out and track ROI● Proud member of Local First Arizona

Create, plan and execute marketing strategiesBuild business relationships with businesses in Metro Phoenix, specifically the East ValleyWork with street team members to increase salesSales for corporate and business accountsHelp share the VIP Taxi story though marketingFix workflow inefficiencies
My duties as co-owner include: Sales and marketingBusiness expansionWeb developmentSocial MediaAndroid and iPhone app developmentBrand reputation management

February 2, 2017, Rani worked with Eric in the same group

Rani and I first met at Yelp, a couple years later we were out trying to start our own businesses. We worked together briefly trying to start our own marketing company when we both realized that we were trying to focus on different things and since that time Rani has done nothing but blow his business up. It's no surprise, his knack for branding and being able to tell a story with the lines, colors and design that makes up a company's image is the best I've seen. You would be in great hands working with Rani and his company to help grow your business.

summary: Hi, my name is Eric, and I own a call center in the Philippines and a video/web marketing agency in Phoenix, Arizona. Between the two, I offer a lot of resources for businesses that want to grow and become more profitable. Let's schedule a meeting if there is an opportunity for us to work together.  Experience: ● Owner of Pacific Business Services, a fast growing call center/virtual assisting office in Dumaguete, Philippines with clients across the United States and Canada● Founded Monsoon Marketing & Video Productions● Co-Founded taxi startup Tru Cab LLC● 1.5 years at Yelp.com, learned how to be a sales pro● 1.5 years at RIESTER, working as Content Coordinator I worked with almost every aspect of the agency creating content for social media and online media. ● 5+ years at Chase bank working directly with consumers. Goals: ● Have 100+ agents working in Dumaguete for Pacific Business Services office by end of 2017. ● Keep making videos that tell the story about amazing businesses with Monsoon Marketing● Hire 1-2 staff for Monsoon Marketing in Arizona by 2017● Remember to have fun and enjoy life● Family > Friends > Business● Start making short films and documentaries by 2021Specialties: Transportation solutions, business partnerships, Advertising, Social Media, Online Advertising, Sales negotiation, Photography, Video production (Premiere Pro), Graphic Design (Photoshop, Illustrator), HTML, Wordpress, Adobe Creative Suite, Content Marketing, Facebook advertising, local business marketing, B2B sales, B2B marketing, call centers
name: Eric Mulvin
